properties.title: Cabane de l'A Neuve CAS
properties.description: The very rustic SAC cabin seems to be proud of its spectacular location on top of a promontory 1100 m above La Fouly in Val Ferret. Surrounded by equally proud glaciered summits with their steep faces, it is an insider’s tip and offers a true mountain experience for sporty children. The cabin’s interior makes for a quaint and authentic atmosphere.
